sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useEffect, useRef } from "react" const AREA_MAXIMA = 50 const CANVAS_WIDTH = 1200 const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 800 const DistributionCanvas = ({ distribucion }) => { const canvasRef = useRef(null) useEffect(() => { if (!canvasRef.current || !distribucion) return const canvas = canvasRef.current const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d") const bgGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT) bgGradient.addColorStop(0, "#f8f9fa") bgGradient.addColorStop(0.5, "#ffffff") bgGradient.addColorStop(1, "#f1f3f5") ctx.fillStyle = bgGradient ctx.fillRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT) ctx.strokeStyle = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)" ctx.lineWidth = 1 const gridSize = 50 for (let x = 0; x <= CANVAS_WIDTH; x += gridSize) { ctx.globalAlpha = x % (gridSize * 2) === 0 ? 0.12 : 0.06 ctx.beginPath() ctx.moveTo(x, 0) ctx.lineTo(x, CANVAS_HEIGHT) ctx.stroke() } for (let y = 0; y <= CANVAS_HEIGHT; y += gridSize) { ctx.globalAlpha = y % (gridSize * 2) === 0 ? 0.12 : 0.06 ctx.beginPath() ctx.moveTo(0, y) ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH, y) ctx.stroke() } ctx.globalAlpha = 1 ctx.strokeStyle = "#667eea" ctx.lineWidth = 6 ctx.strokeRect(3, 3, CANVAS_WIDTH - 6, CANVAS_HEIGHT - 6) const colores = [ { fill: "#667eea", shadow: "#4c63d2", light: "#8b9aff", border: "#364fc7" }, { fill: "#12b886", shadow: "#0ca678", light: "#38d9a9", border: "#099268" }, { fill: "#fab005", shadow: "#e09f04", light: "#fcc419", border: "#c77700" }, { fill: "#fa5252", shadow: "#e03e3e", light: "#ff6b6b", border: "#c92a2a" }, { fill: "#228be6", shadow: "#1c7ed6", light: "#4dabf7", border: "#1864ab" }, { fill: "#be4bdb", shadow: "#ae3ec9", light: "#da77f2", border: "#862e9c" }, { fill: "#20c997", shadow: "#1bb386", light: "#63e6be", border: "#0b7285" }, { fill: "#fd7e14", shadow: "#e8590c", light: "#ff922b", border: "#d9480f" }, { fill: "#4c6ef5", shadow: "#3b5bdb", light: "#748ffc", border: "#364fc7" }, { fill: "#82c91e", shadow: "#74b816", light: "#a9e34b", border: "#5c940d" }, { fill: "#15aabf", shadow: "#1098ad", light: "#3bc9db", border: "#0c8599" }, { fill: "#e64980", shadow: "#d6336c", light: "#f06595", border: "#a61e4d" }, ] const escala = Math.sqrt((CANVAS_WIDTH * CANVAS_HEIGHT) / AREA_MAXIMA) * 0.75 let x = 60 let y = 120 let maxHeightInRow = 0 distribucion.forEach((item, index) => { const areaUnitaria = item.area const cantidad = item.cantidad const colorSet = colores[index % colores.length] for (let i = 0; i < cantidad; i++) { const lado = Math.sqrt(areaUnitaria) * escala if (x + lado > CANVAS_WIDTH - 60) { x = 60 y += maxHeightInRow + 25 maxHeightInRow = 0 } if (y + lado > CANVAS_HEIGHT - 60) { break } ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)" ctx.shadowBlur = 20 ctx.shadowOffsetX = 0 ctx.shadowOffsetY = 8 const radius = Math.min(lado * 0.12, 16) const internalGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(x, y, x + lado, y + lado) internalGradient.addColorStop(0, colorSet.light) internalGradient.addColorStop(0.5, colorSet.fill) internalGradient.addColorStop(1, colorSet.shadow) ctx.fillStyle = internalGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x, y, lado, lado, radius) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = colorSet.border ctx.lineWidth = 4 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x, y, lado, lado, radius) ctx.stroke() const highlightGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(x, y, x, y + lado * 0.5) highlightGradient.addColorStop(0, "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4)") highlightGradient.addColorStop(1, "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)") ctx.fillStyle = highlightGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x, y, lado, lado * 0.5, [radius, radius, 0, 0]) ctx.fill() if (lado > 70) { ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 18px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.textBaseline = "middle" const texto = item.nombre.length > 15 ? item.nombre.substring(0, 13) + "..." : item.nombre ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)" ctx.shadowBlur = 6 ctx.shadowOffsetX = 1 ctx.shadowOffsetY = 1 ctx.fillText(texto, x + lado / 2, y + lado / 2 - 16) ctx.font = "600 15px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)" ctx.fillText(`${areaUnitaria.toFixed(2)} m²`, x + lado / 2, y + lado / 2 + 8) ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" ctx.shadowBlur = 8 ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.75)" ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x + lado - 38, y + 10, 28, 24, 8) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 13px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.fillText(`#${i + 1}`, x + lado - 24, y + 22) ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" } else if (lado > 40) { ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 24px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.textBaseline = "middle" ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)" ctx.shadowBlur = 6 ctx.fillText(item.nombre.charAt(0), x + lado / 2, y + lado / 2) ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" } x += lado + 25 maxHeightInRow = Math.max(maxHeightInRow, lado) } }) const legendX = 60 const legendY = CANVAS_HEIGHT - 70 - distribucion.length * 42 const legendWidth = 380 ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12)" ctx.shadowBlur = 30 ctx.shadowOffsetX = 0 ctx.shadowOffsetY = 8 ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.98)" ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX - 25, legendY - 25, legendWidth, distribucion.length * 42 + 50, 18) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = "#667eea" ctx.lineWidth = 3 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX - 25, legendY - 25, legendWidth, distribucion.length * 42 + 50, 18) ctx.stroke() ctx.fillStyle = "#212529" ctx.font = "bold 16px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "left" ctx.fillText("Catálogo de Artículos", legendX, legendY - 5) distribucion.forEach((item, index) => { const colorSet = colores[index % colores.length] ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)" ctx.shadowBlur = 10 const itemGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient( legendX, legendY + index * 42 + 20, legendX + 32, legendY + index * 42 + 52, ) itemGradient.addColorStop(0, colorSet.light) itemGradient.addColorStop(0.5, colorSet.fill) itemGradient.addColorStop(1, colorSet.shadow) ctx.fillStyle = itemGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX, legendY + index * 42 + 20, 32, 32, 8) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = colorSet.border ctx.lineWidth = 3 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX, legendY + index * 42 + 20, 32, 32, 8) ctx.stroke() ctx.fillStyle = "#212529" ctx.font = "600 16px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "left" ctx.fillText(`${item.nombre}`, legendX + 46, legendY + index * 42 + 36) const cantidadText = `${item.cantidad} unid.` const cantidadWidth = ctx.measureText(cantidadText).width + 18 ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)" ctx.shadowBlur = 8 ctx.fillStyle = colorSet.fill ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect( legendX + 46 + ctx.measureText(item.nombre).width + 14, legendY + index * 42 + 24, cantidadWidth, 24, 12, ) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 13px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.fillText( cantidadText, legendX + 46 + ctx.measureText(item.nombre).width + 14 + cantidadWidth / 2, legendY + index * 42 + 36, ) }) ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12)" ctx.shadowBlur = 25 ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.98)" ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 280, 25, 560, 70, 16) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = "#667eea" ctx.lineWidth = 3 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 280, 25, 560, 70, 16) ctx.stroke() ctx.fillStyle = "#212529" ctx.font = "bold 24px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.fillText("Distribución Óptima de Artículos", CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, 50) const areaTotal = distribucion.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.areaTotal, 0).toFixed(2) const porcentaje = ((areaTotal / AREA_MAXIMA) * 100).toFixed(1) ctx.fillStyle = "#667eea" ctx.font = "600 16px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.fillText(`Área utilizada: ${areaTotal} m² de ${AREA_MAXIMA} m² (${porcentaje}%)`, CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, 75) }, [distribucion]) return (
) } export default DistributionCanvas
